metadata.title: FTL: The Old Guard
metadata.author: Arc
metadata.description: Adds a new Turret Control system and the ships that have it. Adds the Iron Watch, a group of Explorers, Scientists and Pirates whom have formed a collective on the edge of explored space. Adds the New Dawn, a splinter group of the Iron Watch unhappy with the current direction of the faction, and looking to change it with force.
